issue.title: google.com

issue.title: coinness.com

issue.title: Проблемы со скрытием рекламы в стилях!
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.20.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://4pda.to/2025/03/07/439523/cherry_vypustila_pervuyu_v_mire_mysh_s_ii_i_golosovym_upravleniem/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Block WebRTC, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>Думаю, описывать ничего не нужно, всё и так видно.  Скажу только, что с браузерным плагином такого не было, расширения Extra не давало этому баннеру показываться!


<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6f26514f-ac2c-4cef-8368-eb9aed701494)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 中国地区 微信 APP与谷歌商城wechat APP是隔离的，并且应该是限制+86号码进行注册，所以你这边无法完成注册应该是正常的。

我之前也有尝试解决这个广告，但是也只能做到和报告中的效果一样，拦截掉广告图片，但是广告本身的占位无法拦截，通过与其他人的交流得知，需要把adguard的证书移动到系统证书才能解决这个问题，但是移动证书需要root权限，所以我放弃了。
